passage_text: Join Our Newsletter. Most refrigerators feature one or two interior drawers called crisper drawers. The purpose of these drawers is to have a place inside the fridge that regulates humidity in addition to temperature. Store fruits, vegetables and meats in the drawers, and set the crisper setting -- ranging from high to low -- based on the contents of the drawer to maintain the freshness of the food items.
